Extension of Generalized
			 System of Preferences

Section 13031(j)(3) of

, in the case of a corporation with assets of not less than

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 6655 of the Internal
			 Revenue Code of 1986

header.#text:
Time for payment
			 of corporate estimated taxes

text.#text:
the amount of any
			 required installment of corporate estimated tax which is otherwise due in July,
			 August, or September of 2018 shall be increased by 1.25 percent of such amount
			 (determined without regard to any increase in such amount not contained in such
			 Code); and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be appropriately reduced to reflect the amount of the increase by reason
			 of such paragraph.

text.#text:
the amount of the
			 next required installment after an installment referred to in
